channel.title: Help needed for ::noclip
channel.description:
if i do ::noclip im banned but if my friend does ::noclip he isnt banned and he can walk trough the walls:(
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("lol")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to noclip and has been autobanned!"); appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true;
thats the code im using for the command ::noclip is anything wrong with that plzz help me

item.title: Help needed for ::noclip

@pwned_my_mom wrote:

illslayu thanks now is noclip working thanks m8
moderaters please delete this post now

item.title: Help needed for ::noclip
item.dc:creator: @illslayu illslayu
item.description:
@illslayu wrote:

remove the “!” before the “&& !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“lol”)) {”

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed for ::noclip
item.dc:creator: @Avalon Avalon
item.description:
@Avalon wrote:

If your name on the server is different from “lol”, then you will be banned.

&& !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("lol")) {

Change the “lol” String to whatever your name on the server is.

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed for ::noclip
item.dc:creator: @Menno582 Menno582
item.description:
@Menno582 wrote:

[size=15pt]Explaining[/size]

[quote=“pwned my mom, post:1, topic:275910”]if i do ::noclip im banned
but if my friend does ::noclip he isnt banned and he can walk trough the walls:(

[quote] } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”)
&& !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“lol”)) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " tried to noclip and has been autobanned!");
appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;[/quote]
thats the code im using for the command ::noclip
is anything wrong with that
plzz help me[/quote]

Remove this: && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“lol”)) {

That means, that if your username is ’ lol ’ then you will
be banned

[quote=“cows1471, post:2, topic:275910”] } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " tried to noclip and has been autobanned!");
appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;

try that![/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed for ::noclip
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") {
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
                + " tried to noclip and has been autobanned!");
        appendToBanned(playerName);
        disconnected = true;

try that!

Read full topic
